stories.text:
I'm building an open source activity indicators library based on reanimated 2 and wanted to know what activity indicator animations you guys would want to see in the package?

Package Key Benefits: - fluid on 120fps (thanks to reanimated v2.3.0+). (the basic react-native animated is limited to 60fps) - customisable using useAnimatedStyle - controllable from worklets, so you can start / stop the activity indicator as a response to a gesture handler, and thus provide instant feedback

I look forward to your suggestions in the comments bellow
stories.title: What Reanimated2 Activity Indicators would you like to have?
